about_the_game:
You might've solved a ton of puzzles now. Your friends and family have also joined you on your crazy puzzle adventures, but now you can be unique and stand out from the crowd with this customization pack!

This pack unlocks a couple of things for you to enhance and personalize your experience in the main game.

Cosmetics
For now you can choose the colour of your flags! Bright red? A shade of purple? Lime green? It is all up to you, the sky is the limit!
You also have the option to select a different type of flag.
[more will be coming soon...]

Custom game mode
Tired or bored of what the game had to offer? Crank that fuel of steroids fully wide open and generate the kind of grids that you want to solve! The only limit is the strength of your computer. For starters you will be able to to choose between limited and unlimited grids.
Limited allows you to mark tiles as playable/unplayable.
Unlimited allows you to generate massive square/rectangular shaped puzzles to solve.
These levels are Garden and Garden Plus, which can be found under Garden.
For now this will be available for 2D sweeper only.
[more will be coming soon...]

Future plans
This pack will grant you access to a couple of future content related to the custom game modes and cosmetics. With each update and added content the price of this DLC will increase, meaning that the early buyers will get the most value! Don't worry, the price will be fair for what it offers.

Support
Last but not least, this pack is also made to support the dev behind this game. More revenue means more time to work on juicy and awesome content. Let's make this the ultimate sweeper game together.
The base RTX Sweeper is and will always remain a free-to-play game.

name: RTX Sweeper - Customization (Support Dev)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-3570K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 780ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything
  • Additional Notes: This is without ray tracing features
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 5600G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything
  • Additional Notes: DirectX12 contains the ray tracing features

short_description: Giving RTX Sweeper that extra bit of juice that you might be looking for.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Hindi
